function.name: extract_washing_machine_features
function.description: Extract key washing machine specifications from Google search results.

type.description: Motor type: Universal (AC belt), BLDC (DC belt; Bosch Eco-Silence = BLDC), Direct Drive (DC no belt).

technology.description: Whether the washing machine uses inverter motor technology.

smart.description: Whether the washing machine supports IOT, Wi-Fi, mobile app, or voice assistants.
